TextView.android:text: Problem Statement: Mobile game for Alzheimer’s Disease detection. Idea/Solution to problem statement: We plan to build an interactive, easy to use, android app game that can help with detection of Alzheimer's. Alzheimer’s disease is an irreversible, progressive brain disorder that slowly destroys memory and thinking skills. The first symptoms of Alzheimer’s vary from person to person but are mainly: • Decline in non-memory aspects of cognition such as word-finding • Vision/Spatial issues • Impaired reasoning or judgment etc
